name: iPhone Backup Browser Free
short_description:
You can conveniently recover iPhone data from iTunes backup in a few simple clicks by connecting iPhone to computer. However, iTunes won’t allow you to browse the data in the backup file directly. Don’t get disappointed. iPhone Backup Browser Free can help you browse and recover data from iPhone backup. You are able to preview the data before recovery and recover exactly what you want. 

Easily browse and recover data from iTunes backups created for iPhone 6/6 Plus/5S/5/4S, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 3, the new iPad, iPod touch 5, etc. 
No need to connect your iPhone to computer. You can browse and recover data from iTunes backup even if your iPhone is lost or damaged. 
Freely preview all contacts like photos, videos, messages, contacts, call history, notes, WhatsApp, and more before recovery.
summary: Browse and Recover Data from iPhone Backups Free
